trans-unit.source: Retrieves information about the file system and volume associated with the specified root directory

target.mrk: Retrieves information about the file system and volume associated with the specified root directory

trans-unit.source: [optional] The root directory of the volume to be described. If this parameter is empty string, the root

seg-source.mrk: The root directory of the volume to be described.
If this parameter is empty string, the root

target.mrk: The root directory of the volume to be described.
If this parameter is empty string, the root

trans-unit.source: of the current directory is used. A trailing backslash is required. For example, you specify

seg-source.mrk: of the current directory is used.

target.mrk: of the current directory is used.

trans-unit.source: The array that contains the following information:

seg-source.mrk: The array that contains the following information:

target.mrk: The array that contains the following information:

trans-unit.source: [2] - The serial number of a volume.

seg-source.mrk: [2] - The serial number of a volume.

target.mrk: [2] - The serial number of a volume.

trans-unit.source: [1] - The maximum length, in TCHARs, of a file name component that a file system supports.

seg-source.mrk: [1] - The maximum length, in TCHARs, of a file name component that a file system supports.

target.mrk: [1] - The maximum length, in TCHARs, of a file name component that a file system supports.

trans-unit.source: [3] - The flags associated with the file system ($FILE_*).

seg-source.mrk: [3] - The flags associated with the file system ($FILE_*).

target.mrk: [3] - The flags associated with the file system ($FILE_*).

trans-unit.source: [4] - The name of the file system, for example, "FAT", "NTFS", etc.

seg-source.mrk: [4] - The name of the file system, for example, "FAT", "NTFS", etc.

target.mrk: [4] - The name of the file system, for example, "FAT", "NTFS", etc.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

trans-unit.source: When a user attempts to get information about a floppy drive that does not have a floppy disk, or a CD-ROM
